response.overview: On the morning of September 9, 2011, at 9:30 am, the Chaoyang District People's Court in Beijing rendered a first-instance verdict on the case of Wang Lihong, charged with "picking quarrels and provoking trouble," at the Wenyu River courtroom. Wang Lihong's friends once again gathered at the scene to show their support. Following "Let Sunshine Reach the Ground," Ai Xiaoming captured the events of that day and conducted interviews with lawyers, citizen journalists, artists, and others, documenting their perspectives on the trial of Wang Lihong's case.
response.title: Postcard
